 1999-05711999-03-250,  ,  ,  ,  IA&ND,  TB, 
PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into a SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the STONEY TRIBE (consisting of the Bearspaw, Chiniki and Wesley Bands) which provides for the settlement of a specific claim involving the 1888 re-survey and subsequent alienation in 1889 of 320 acres of its reserve near Calgary, Alberta, and (b) to accept the Instrument of Absolute Surrender set out in Article 4 of the Settlement Agreement.
